nodes.text: The V-series droid supervisor was a model of supervisor droid manufactured by MerenData. It was a redesign of the EV-series supervisor droid, created to distance the company from the financial damage and PR disaster caused by the recall of a defective batch of EV units. A V-series droid designated AV-6R7 oversaw labor droids working on the second Death Star and was assigned as a liaison to the Super Star Destroyer Executor.
